name: Kitty Pig
summary: Take control of Pig and move to bounce Kitty high in the sky to collect bugs. Keep Kitty in the air as long as you can to chase hi-scores, but be warned, with each new level Kitty bounces faster and faster as tricky beetles join the fray!
